mapper.select: SELECT e.MEM_NO , e.MEM_NAME , e.MEM_EMAIL, e.MEM_ZIPCODE, e.MEM_ADDR1, e.MEM_ADDR2, e.MEM_HIREDATE, e.MEM_POSITION, e.MEM_RES, e.DEPT_NO, f.JG_NO , f.JG_NAME, f.L_NO, f.L_NAME, f.JOB_NO, f.JOB_NAME, f.JG_NO FROM TBL_MEMBER e INNER JOIN (SELECT c.JG_NO , c.JG_NAME, d.L_NO, d.L_NAME, d.JOB_NO, d.JOB_NAME FROM TBL_JOBGROUP c INNER JOIN (SELECT a.L_NO, a.L_NAME, b.JOB_NO, b.JOB_NAME, b.JG_NO FROM TBL_LCATEGORY a INNER JOIN TBL_JOB b ON a.JOB_NO = b.JOB_NO) d ON c.JG_NO = d.JG_NO) f ON e.L_NO = f.L_NO WHERE e.MEM_NO = #{memNo} and e.MEM_PW = #{memPw}
